title: Assistant Athletic Director, Premium Ticketing - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Assistant Athletic Director, Premium Ticketing College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: Handle the needs of our Athletics highest level donors and clients. This includes serving as the primary contact person for those season ticket holders in the Athletic Club...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
